subject: Soapbox Derby
lead_paragraph: Girls had their most dominant showing in the history of the All-American Soap Box Derby on Saturday, winning five of six individual titles for the first time and sweeping the three major divisions for only the second time. The performances came during the 71st year of the grand prix of gravity-powered racing in Akron, Ohio. A record 606 finalists from 160 cities and 6 nations competed.
